425 //----------------------------------------------------------------
426 // Events and event queues.
427 
428 // Forward declarations to make up for C's one-pass type checking.
429 struct Event_s;
430 struct EventQueue_s;
431 
436 typedef const struct {
437  struct EventQueue_s *queue; // the queue this event goes on
438  void (*handler)(struct Event_s *); // called when the event fires
439  void (*marker)(struct Event_s *); // marking fuction, can be NULL
440  const char *name; // event name for debugging purposes
441 } EventActions;
442 
443 typedef struct Event_s {
444  EventActions *actions; // static data
445 
446  // For internal use only, but the 'next' field must be initialized
447  // to NULL.
448  struct Event_s *next;
449  uint32_t timeToExecute;
450 } Event;
451 
455 typedef struct EventQueue_s {
456  Event *isrEvents;
457  Event *events;
458 } EventQueue;

495 typedef struct {
496  // The time when the next event associated with this task will fire
497  uint32_t nextEventTime;
498  // The list of events associated with this task
499  EmberEventData *events;
500  // A flag that indicates the task has something to do other than events
501  bool busy;
502 } EmberTaskControl;
